data.title: SCREENPLAY: TALES OF ORDINARY MADNESS - SIGNED
data.meta_description: Rome: Nuova Stampa S.R.L., 1981 . First Edition. Screenplay for Marco Ferreri's 1981 film Storie di Ordinaria Follia, based on the stories in Bukowski's 1972 collectiom Erections, Ejaculations, Exhibitions and General Tales of Ordinary Madness. The film starred Ornella Muti alongside Ben Gazzara, who played the Bukowski figure Charles Serking. Uncommon, especially signed. Item #6566
data.text:
Rome: Nuova Stampa S.R.L., [1981]. First Edition. Screenplay for Marco Ferreri's 1981 film Storie di Ordinaria Follia, based on the stories in Bukowski's 1972 collectiom Erections, Ejaculations, Exhibitions and General Tales of Ordinary Madness. The film starred Ornella Muti alongside Ben Gazzara, who played the Bukowski figure "Charles Serking." Uncommon, especially signed. Item #6566

Quarto (28cm); mechanically reproduced sheets (rectos), velo-bound into powder grey card covers, with typed title label mounted to upper front cover; [i],[1],2-78,[1]pp. Signed by Bukowski in felt-tipped pen on the front cover. Light wear and gentle sunning to wrapper extremities; Near Fine.
